content: I don't have access to specific details about the planned content strategy of spotify and the ringer. however, it is likely that the acquisition will result in the development of new podcast shows and the adaptation of existing content for distribution on the spotify platform. with the expertise of the ringer's podcast production team, spotify is well-positioned to continue to expand its podcast catalog and offer a wide range of content across different genres and topics, including sports, music, culture, and news.
